languages.text: Неожиданно динамики вокса, настроенного на частоту второго отряда, ожили. Речь, звучащая из них, казалась приглушенной, будто человек не говорил в вокс, а нечаянно нажал на кнопку передачи, занимаясь каким-то своим делом. "Никогда такого не видел..." — донеслось из динамика. "Красиво! Подождите... подождите... оно что, движется?!"

traits.locale_text: Неожиданно динамики вокса, настроенного на частоту второго отряда, ожили. Речь, звучащая из них, казалась приглушенной, будто человек не говорил в вокс, а нечаянно нажал на кнопку передачи, занимаясь каким-то своим делом. "Никогда такого не видел..." — донеслось из динамика. "Красиво! Подождите... подождите... оно что, движется?!"

languages.text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"
languages.original_text: Неожиданно динамики вокса, настроенного на частоту второго отряда, ожили. Речь, звучащая из них, казалась приглушенной, будто человек не говорил в вокс, а нечаянно нажал на кнопку передачи, занимаясь каким-то своим делом. "Никогда такого не видел..." — донеслось из динамика. "Красиво! Подождите... подождите... оно что, движется?!"

The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait.... is it — is it moving?"

The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait.... is it — is it moving?"

The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait.... is it — is it moving?"

Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

languages.text: De pronto, el voco sintonizado a la frecuencia de la segunda unidad empezó a emitir sonido. Las palabras sonaban amortiguadas, como si la persona en el otro extremo no estuviera hablando al voco, sino pulsando el botón de transmisión desesperadamente mientras hacía otra cosa. «Nunca había visto algo así... ¡Es magnífico! Espera... un momento... se... ¿Se ha movido?».
languages.original_text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: De pronto, el voco sintonizado a la frecuencia de la segunda unidad empezó a emitir sonido. Las palabras sonaban amortiguadas, como si la persona en el otro extremo no estuviera hablando al voco, sino pulsando el botón de transmisión desesperadamente mientras hacía otra cosa. «Nunca había visto algo así... ¡Es magnífico! Espera... un momento... se... ¿Se ha movido?».

languages.text: 突然之间，音阵系统传来了声音，声音来自第二小队。里面的声音听起来很模糊，似乎另一边的人并没有直接对着音阵装置讲话，而是在忙于其他的事情的时候不小心按住了发送按钮。“我从来没见过这样的东西……它实在是太美了！等等……它……它是在动吗？”
languages.original_text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: 突然之间，音阵系统传来了声音，声音来自第二小队。里面的声音听起来很模糊，似乎另一边的人并没有直接对着音阵装置讲话，而是在忙于其他的事情的时候不小心按住了发送按钮。“我从来没见过这样的东西……它实在是太美了！等等……它……它是在动吗？”

languages.text: 突然、2番目の部隊の周波数に合わせたヴォクスから音が鳴り響く。その言葉はくぐもっていて、まるで相手がヴォクスに直接話しているのではなく、何か他のことに夢中で必死に送信ボタンを押しているかのようだ。「こんなものは見たことがない…美しい！ちょっと…待て…これは、何が動いて…？」
languages.original_text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: 突然、2番目の部隊の周波数に合わせたヴォクスから音が鳴り響く。その言葉はくぐもっていて、まるで相手がヴォクスに直接話しているのではなく、何か他のことに夢中で必死に送信ボタンを押しているかのようだ。「こんなものは見たことがない…美しい！ちょっと…待て…これは、何が動いて…？」

languages.text: Plötzlich erklangen Worte aus dem Vox, das auf die Frequenz der zweiten Einheit gestellt war. Sie waren gedämpft, als spräche die Person am anderen Ende nicht direkt in das Gerät, sondern würde verzweifelt die Sendetaste drücken, während sie mit etwas anderem beschäftigt war. "So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen ... Es ist wunderschön! Moment ... wartet ... bewegt es sich?"
languages.original_text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: Plötzlich erklangen Worte aus dem Vox, das auf die Frequenz der zweiten Einheit gestellt war. Sie waren gedämpft, als spräche die Person am anderen Ende nicht direkt in das Gerät, sondern würde verzweifelt die Sendetaste drücken, während sie mit etwas anderem beschäftigt war. "So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen ... Es ist wunderschön! Moment ... wartet ... bewegt es sich?"

languages.text: Une voix jaillit soudain du vox, qui était réglé sur la fréquence de la deuxième unité. Elle était étouffée, comme si la personne ne parlait pas directement dans l'appareil, mais essayait de communiquer tout en étant occupée par autre chose. « Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel... C'est magnifique ! Une minute... Je rêve ou... ça a bougé ? »
languages.original_text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: Une voix jaillit soudain du vox, qui était réglé sur la fréquence de la deuxième unité. Elle était étouffée, comme si la personne ne parlait pas directement dans l'appareil, mais essayait de communiquer tout en étant occupée par autre chose. « Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel... C'est magnifique ! Une minute... Je rêve ou... ça a bougé ? »

languages.text: İkinci birimin frekansına ayarlanan vokstan ani bir ses yükseldi. Kelimelerin boğukluğu, voksun öbür ucundaki kişinin doğrudan voksa konuşmadığı izlenimini uyandırıyordu. Sanki başka bir şeyle meşgulken çaresizce ileti düğmesine basıyordu... "Daha önce böyle bir şey görmemiştim... Ne kadar da güzel! Bir saniye... Kıpırdıyor mu o?"
languages.original_text: Sound suddenly blared from the vox, which was tuned to the second unit's frequency. The words sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: İkinci birimin frekansına ayarlanan vokstan ani bir ses yükseldi. Kelimelerin boğukluğu, voksun öbür ucundaki kişinin, doğrudan voksa konuşmadığı izlenimini uyandırıyordu. Sanki başka bir şeyle meşgulken çaresizce ileti düğmesine basıyordu… "Daha önce böyle bir şey görmemiştim… Ne kadar da güzel! Bir saniye… O… Kıpırdıyor mu?"
